ch0241_00_kojiro/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah, if it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Today will be the day I make your partner
Pokémon mine once and for all!
ch0241_00_kojiro/0101_0701_02_10:
Oh, hush! I couldn’t defeat you all alone even if
I wanted to. Next time, though! Mark my words!
ch0241_00_kojiro/0602_0701_01_10:
When I was in town the other day, I overheard a
Trainer say that she was collecting bottle caps.
ch0241_00_kojiro/0602_0701_02_10:
I’m something of a bottle cap connoisseur myself,
so I walked over and started up a conversation.
Turned out we were NOT on the same page...
ch0241_00_kojiro/0602_0701_03_10:
She just kept going on about some guy in another
region who’ll give your Pokémon special training
in exchange for silver or gold bottle caps.
ch0241_00_kojiro/0602_0701_04_10:
I was looking forward to gushing about my
collection, but as usual, I ended up
disappointed... *sigh*
ch0241_00_kojiro/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. You have a lot
of teammates, right? Are there particular Trainers
that you spend most of your time with?
ch0241_00_kojiro/0605_0701_02_10:
Jessie, Meowth, and I have always been together,
just the three of us. Working with them is as easy
as breathing.
ch0241_00_kojiro/0605_0701_03_10:
Someday, we’ll have to battle you and your dream
team, trio versus trio, and see which team has the
stronger bond!
ch0241_00_kojiro/1701_0701_01_10:
Ahh, there you are! Come here, I have something
for you.
ch0241_00_kojiro/1701_0701_02_10:
This is your share of the profits. Don’t go spending
it all at once!
ch0241_00_kojiro/1701_0702_01_10: That’s a thanks to you and a debt repaid for me!
ch0241_00_kojiro/2501_0701_01_10:
Weezing has been my partner in crime since he
was just a little Koffing. I actually got him as a
gift from the boss one year!
ch0241_00_kojiro/2501_0701_02_10:
He risks his neck for me whenever we battle, and
he’s always there to give us an escape route
with his smokescreen!
ch0241_00_kojiro/2501_0701_03_10:
He’s just as much a part of Team Rocket as me
or Jessie or Meowth!
ch0241_00_kojiro/2501_0702_01_10:
Someday...just like with any other friendship,
I know there’ll come a day when the two of us
have to say good-bye.
ch0241_00_kojiro/2501_0702_02_10:
But just thinking about that makes me... *sniffle*
I...I just get so emotional, you know!
ch0241_00_kojiro/3001_0701_01_10:
Pleasant morning we’re having, don’t you think?
Ahhh, days like these are just perfect for getting
up to no good!
ch0241_00_kojiro/3001_0701_02_10:
You got that right! Even my charm is sparklin’
in the sunlight! That’s a good sign!
ch0241_00_kojiro/3002_0701_01_10:
Have you eaten breakfast yet? *sigh*
I wonder if there’s a donut shop on Pasio...
I’m so hungry, I could eat more than a Snorlax.
ch0241_00_kojiro/3002_0701_02_10:
Me too, but our budget’s been cut ’cause we
mess up so much, remember? Now we can’t
even afford donut holes!
ch0241_00_kojiro/3003_0701_01_10:
My clever plan to capture all the Pokémon
on Pasio is almost comple— *cough cough* Oh!
Is the café selling ice cream now?! Gotta run!
ch0241_00_kojiro/3003_0701_02_10:
M-me, too! Nobody said nothin’ about capturin’
any Pokémon! *cough cough*
ch0241_00_kojiro/3004_0701_01_10:
Anywhere there’s peace in the universe, Team
Rocket will be there to make everything worse!
Conscience, shmonscience!
ch0241_00_kojiro/3004_0701_02_10:
Ya better watch out if you’re havin’ a good
day, ’cause Team Rocket’ll be there to
wreck it!
ch0241_00_kojiro/3005_0701_01_10:
Oh, are you going out tonight? We were thinking
of burning the midnight oil and making some
new disguises!
ch0241_00_kojiro/3005_0701_02_10:
You should see James’s disguises! Talk
about primo goods! But it’s yours truly that
handles all the fabric cuttin’!
ch0241_00_kojiro/3006_0701_01_10:
Twerps like you should be in bed by now. What
are you doing up? You’re not...*chuckle* up to no
good, are you?
ch0241_00_kojiro/3006_0701_02_10:
Nah, get outta here! You gotta be a good li’l
twerp and stay outta trouble, or else our
job would be no fun!
